text: The 2015 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship Division B was the 11th edition of the Division B of the FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship, the second-tier level of the European Under-20 basketball championship. The tournament was played in Székesfehérvár, Hungary, from 9 to 19 July, 2015. ==Participating teams== * * * * * * * (20th place, 2014 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship Division A) * * * * * (18th place, 2014 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship Division A) * * * * * (19th place, 2014 FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship Division A) * ==First round== In this round, the eighteen teams were allocated in two groups of five teams and two groups of four teams. The top two teams in each group advanced to the Second round.
